Discovered a web application that executed system commands based on user input
Manipulated the user input field by appending a command separator (; or &&) followed by an arbitrary command
Web application executed the appended command and displayed the output, confirming the presence of a Command Injection vulnerability
Crafted an input to execute a command to read the content of the flag file (e.g. ping example.com; cat /path/to/flag.txt)
Submitted the crafted input, the web application executed the command and displayed the content of the flag file, obtaining the flag needed to complete the challenge
